name: places/ChIJzxxfLYRYwokRN7ljfQgBBVc
formattedAddress: 492 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 492 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chic women's apparel outpost featuring a variety of clothing & accessories in contemporary styles.

originalText.text: Darryl’s is such a sweet shopping spot! I came into the store out of curiosity, and left (adorably new jacket and shirt in-hand) knowing that I’d stumbled upon a staple boutique that everyone should be lucky enough to shop in! Darry and Ed were super welcoming, and I can’t wait to come back! Go visit these guys is my strong recommendation.

text.text: Darryl’s is such a sweet shopping spot! originalText.text: I went to Darryl’s looking for a snazzy suit to wear in homage to the subject of my forthcoming book about a 19th Century surgeon, feminist & cross dresser (I Could Not Do Otherwise: The Remarkable Life of Dr. Mary Edwards Walker if you’re interested). Darryl immediately brought me this suit which I probably never picked out on my own and the minute I put it on I knew it was perfect and fabulous! Darryl is the best. Thank you!

text.text: I went to Darryl’s looking for a snazzy suit to wear in homage to the subject of my forthcoming book about a 19th Century surgeon, feminist & cross dresser (I Could Not Do Otherwise: The Remarkable Life of Dr. Mary Edwards Walker if you’re interested). Darryl immediately brought me this suit which I probably never picked out on my own and the minute I put it on I knew it was perfect and fabulous! Darryl is the best. Thank you!

originalText.text: I was flying to another country and was going to have dinner with the head of state with my husband. Literally, post Covid, I had nothing to wear, and had not figured it out. Popped into Darryl’s about two hours before leaving for the airport and within 25 minutes, Darryl had completely outfitted me with everything I needed for a few smart, classy, easy-to-travel-with outfits so that I had some choice once I knew more about the dress for dinner. Thank you Darryl!!!

text.text: I was flying to another country and was going to have dinner with the head of state with my husband. Literally, post Covid, I had nothing to wear, and had not figured it out. Popped into Darryl’s about two hours before leaving for the airport and within 25 minutes, Darryl had completely outfitted me with everything I needed for a few smart, classy, easy-to-travel-with outfits so that I had some choice once I knew more about the dress for dinner. Thank you Darryl!!!

originalText.text: Darryl is like having your own personal stylist.  I have gone to him in a pinch twice now. Each time he has picked things I may not have on my own that fit perfectly and he has shown me how to style them to look even better. This store and Darryl are a treasure to the neighborhood!

text.text: Darryl is like having your own personal stylist.  I have gone to him in a pinch twice now. Each time he has picked things I may not have on my own that fit perfectly and he has shown me how to style them to look even better. This store and Darryl are a treasure to the neighborhood!

originalText.text:
Just bought four fabulous dresses at Daryl’s for various events and I can’t be more satisfied. Really there was a fifth that was fabulously chic but my pocketbook told me no. Every time I go there I come away with something that I never would have bought while browsing online or digging through the racks in any of the NYC dept stores. Daryl is helpful without being pushy and makes excellent suggestions.

One last important benefit: his clothing fits women of any age but ALSO women of a certain age who are looking for style without necessarily revealing various parts of our bodies that a few decades before we would have been happy to flaunt.

I highly recommend you try a visit and if you think it isn’t your style or if there is nothing you see that you usually wear, let Daryl suggest some pieces.
